extendedInfo.description: Study, learn and master words on your phone. Create and play fun, tailored study programs anywhere, anytime.Features:- Create your own or choose from over 70,000 flashcard decks - Customize your study by grade level, standardized test, or subject- Select your study method - audio pronunciation or definition matching - Sync your online and mobile app progress- Study offline - without an internet connectionThis free flashcards app contains options to share content via social media.

reviews.title: 4-Star Flash
reviews.comment: A great alround flash card app. My only gripe is when creating custom decks. One is not allowed to append definitions of missing words or words having no definition, ergo limiting the app\'s scope for customization.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: All in all I think this app is pretty good, but I wish there was a way to put in your own definition. On the website you can put your own definition, but I can\'t find a way to do it in the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: It sucks that you can\'t make your owns cards without having it to be an ACTUAL word. I was going to use this for my Emergency Medical Responder Acronyms but it only had to be words in the dictionary so that really sucked. Other than that it does help for like History or SAT words.
reviews.author: Krystal Kirkpatrick

reviews.title: Can\'t login
reviews.comment: I\'m use google nexus 7 with android 4.2. i can\'t loggin to this app. Although I pass correct username and password. Anyone can help me?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: It works great and is very helpful. Five stars is well deserved!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A very useful app.
reviews.comment: I like it a lot. It helps me in class to bring variety and encourage students to make their own.
reviews.author: Israel Morales

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Very convenient, useful app full of knowledge along with the most effective method of study all in one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: This would be way better if you could create your own flashcards, not just word definitions, I want a flashcard app not a dictionary card app.  Please add this feature!
reviews.author: Barnaby Tagg

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It helps ke build my vocsbularly while still managing to be fun! It has many different categories of flashcards to choose from!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: You can learn so many great words ect. This app is really useful. I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to navigate
reviews.comment: Moving the slider to see the next card is flaky. Insists on skipping cards. So far I\'ve only seen one new word I didn\'t know.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is a great learning tool for all ages. I do wish that I could save my scores, so that I could compare and see my progress.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice but takes too much space.. :( has almost all d important wrd lists plus d graphics r also gud..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: I am having trouble with the study part...i can only view some of the words and definitions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gr8 app.....quit informative n interesting
reviews.comment: Jus downloaded this app and mus say its amazing as far as the info database goes...i wish it had a proper dictionary along with it though...kewp it up guys..like it anyways...:-)
reviews.author: Chaitanya Deshmukh

reviews.title: ATRIX
reviews.comment: Awesomeness redefined.. although it would have been much better if it did not require internet connection every time
reviews.author: anagha s

reviews.title: Taran
reviews.comment: Good app for improving your vocab. However, the audio button for pronunciation works only after hitting it many times on my Galaxy Ace....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Works all right. It is missing some words. I need to be able to add multiple definitions or make my own words and definitions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exasperating glitch
reviews.comment: My custom decks randomly dissapear after adding new vocabulary words and pressing save. So in other words, often, the save button deletes the deck. Very frustrating after compiling a huge list of words in a deck.
reviews.author: Andrew Lee

reviews.title: Fun and efficient way of improving vocabulary
reviews.comment: It is easy to use and very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User
